ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode: def Load(widget): entity = widget.Entity entity["TIPOCONTRATODIVISOES"].Visible = entity["TIPO"].GetInt32() == 6 entity["EHALCADAPROJETO"].Visible = entity["TIPO"].GetInt32() == 1 entity["ALCADAVALORLIBERARPROXIMONIVEL"].Visible = entity["TIPO"].GetInt32() == 14

def OnTIPOValueChanged(view, entity): entity["TIPOCONTRATODIVISOES"].Visible = entity["TIPO"].GetInt32() == 6 entity["EHALCADAPROJETO"].Visible = entity["TIPO"].GetInt32() == 1 entity["ALCADAVALORLIBERARPROXIMONIVEL"].Visible = entity["TIPO"].GetInt32() == 14
